channel.title: games on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in games on a neuro[log]

item.title: Nintendo Egg Game
item.description: A blast from the past I was cleaning out some more things today and I found this gem. It’s from the early 80s and I must have spent countless hours with my brother and even my parents playing this little game. I looked online and they actually sell for quite a bit of money so I may actually end up selling it. I honestly have no intention of ever playing it again, but it was nice to see it again and yes, it does work.
